alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 3:56AM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. Isolated power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain overnight Sunday is expected to change over to wet snow by Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
